RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT MSG_TYPE,DESCRIPTION,PRIORITY,GENERATE_AT_INPUT FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE WHERE (MODULE = ? OR MODULE='OL') AND ((? = 'I' AND GENERATE_AT_INPUT = 'Y') OR (? <> 'I')) AND SHOW_IN_PRODUCT = 'Y' AND NVL(TRACER, 'N') =DECODE(?,'LC', 'N', NVL(TRACER, 'N'))) WHERE 1=1
SELECT CCY_RATE_TYPE, CCY_RATE_TYPE_DESC FROM CYTM_RATE_TYPE WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y'
SELECT GL_CODE,GL_DESC FROM GLTM_GLMASTER WHERE LEAF='Y' AND AUTH_STAT='A' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' AND CATEGORY IN (3,4)
SELECT GL_CODE,GL_DESC FROM GLTM_GLMASTER WHERE LEAF='Y' AND AUTH_STAT='A' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' AND CATEGORY IN (3,4)
SELECT TRN_CODE, TRN_DESC FROM STTM_TRN_CODE WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y'
SELECT EVENT_CODE, EVENT_DESCR FROM OLTB_EVENT WHERE MODULE = ?

SELECT DISTINCT A.MSG_TYPE, A.DESCRIPTION, A.PRIORITY FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE A WHERE ((A.MODULE = 'OL' OR A.MODULE = ?) AND A.SHOW_IN_PRODUCT = 'Y' AND A.MSG_TYPE <> 'SGLFORM')UNION SELECT DISTINCT A.MSG_TYPE, A.DESCRIPTION, A.PRIORITY FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE A, OLTMS_PRODUCT B WHERE (B.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'BS' AND A.MSG_TYPE = 'SGLFORM' AND A.MODULE = 'SD' AND B.PRODUCT_CODE = ? AND B.MODULE = A.MODULE)
SELECT ROLE_CODE,ROLE_TYPE,ROLE_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTBS_ACCROLE WHERE MODULE = ?
SELECT DISTINCT AMOUNT_TAG, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT_TAG_TYPE FROM OLTB_AMOUNT_TAG WHERE MODULE IN (DECODE(?,'LP','LB',?),DECODE(?,'LP','LP',?)) AND LANGUAGE_CODE = 'ENG'
SELECT TRN_CODE, TRN_DESC FROM STTMS_CORE_TRN_CODE WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y'
SELECT MIS_HEAD,HEAD_DESC FROM OLTM_MIS_HEAD WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' AND RECORD_STAT='O'
SELECT CLASS_CODE,CLASS_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_CLASS WHERE CLASS_TYPE = 'AC' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' AND AUTH_STAT ='A' AND MODULE = ?

SELECT sde_id FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sde_id ,'A' FROM oltms_sde WHERE sde_id NOT IN ('OVR_DAYS') UNION SELECT DISTINCT (class_code || '_' || sde_id) sde_id ,'C' FROM lfvws_interest_class a, oltms_sde b WHERE a.module = 'OL' AND a.once_auth = 'Y' AND a.auth_stat = 'A' AND a.record_stat = 'O' AND b.sde_id IN ('OVR_DAYS') UNION select 'PRINCIPAL' || '_OVR_DAYS' SDE_ID,'B' from dual order by 2)
